mapper.select: select * from (select a.*,b.product_name,b.product_image, b.price,b.product_author,b.product_publisher from t_order a, t_product b where member_id = #{member_id} and a.product_id = b.product_id order by order_no desc) where rownum <= #{orderCount}
select a.*,b.* from t_order a, t_product b where a.product_id =b.product_id order by a.order_no
select a.*,b.* from t_order a, t_product b where a.product_id =b.product_id and a.member_id = #{member_id} order by a.order_no desc
mapper.update: update t_order set member_id = #{member_id}, product_id = #{product_id}, order_amount = #{order_amount}, order_address = #{order_address}, order_phonenum = #{order_phonenum}, order_date = #{order_date}, order_address_detail = #{order_address_detail} where order_no = #{order_no}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.* from (select * from t_member where member_id = #{member_id}) a, t_order b where a.member_id = b.member_id order by b.order_no desc
mapper.update: update t_member set member_point=#{nowHavePoint} where member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: select member_point from t_member where member_id=#{member_id}

select * from (select o.*, p.product_name, p.product_image, p.price, p.product_author, p.product_publisher from t_order o,t_product p where o.product_id = p.product_id order by o.order_no desc) where ROWNUM <= 5

select TO_CHAR(o.order_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') order_date, sum(o.order_amount*p.price) revenue from t_order o,t_product p where o.product_id = p.product_id group by TO_CHAR(o.order_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') order by TO_CHAR(o.order_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') desc

select a.cnt,b.product_name from (select product_id,sum(order_amount) cnt from t_order group by product_id order by sum(order_amount) desc)a,t_product b where a.product_id = b.product_id and rownum <= 5
